traits.Amphibious: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.Multiattack: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) acid damage.
actions.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.Acid Breath (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The dragon exhales acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 14+1d6 + 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 (11d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
